<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Add all child table of rm_story to include_tables of rm_story rank configurtion.</description>
        <name>Add child tables include_tables</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var configGr = new GlideRecord("rank_configuration");
configGr.addQuery('table', 'rm_story');
configGr.addQuery('column', 'global_rank');
configGr.query();

if(configGr.next()) {
	var childList = GlideDBObjectManager.get().getTableExtensions("rm_story");
		var includeTables = []; 
		for(var i = 0; i < childList.size(); i++) {
			var table = String(childList.get(i));
			var ga = new GlideAggregate('rank_configuration');
			ga.addAggregate("COUNT");
			ga.addQuery('table', table).addOrCondition('include_tables', 'CONTAINS', table);
			ga.addQuery('column', 'global_rank');
			ga.query();
			if(ga.next()) {
				if(ga.getAggregate("COUNT") == 0) 
					includeTables.push(table);
			} 
		}
	configGr.setValue('include_tables', includeTables.join(','));
	if(configGr.update()) 
		gs.info("Added all child tables to rm_story rank configuration");
	else 
		gs.info("Fail to add child tables to rm_story rank configuration");
}]]></script>
